issue.title: [C++] Need AllocateBuffer / AllocateResizableBuffer variant with default memory pool
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2825](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2825). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's not very practical that you have to pass the default memory pool explicitly to `AllocateBuffer`.
